org.mdconverter.plugin.writer

Class AbstractWriter<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.mdconverter.plugin.AbstractPlugin<T>
      • org.mdconverter.plugin.writer.AbstractWriter<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Context, Writer

    public abstract class AbstractWriter<T>
extends AbstractPlugin<T>
implements Writer
    Abstract class which has to be implemented by custom writer plugins to be loadable by the framework
    See Also:
    Created by miso on 28.10.2015.
